item.title: You Were the Dee Dee of the Campaign
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: Matt throws money at RSI, every game developer under the sun gets DDOS’d, Obsidian licenses Pathfinder, and DnD 5e is released. We discuss digital download statistics, changing gaming demographics, system exclusives, and more.
